title: $1529 -- Greece: 4-City Vacations, Inc. Air, Hotel, Tours, More
text:
Home > Vacation Package Deals > $1529 -- Greece: 4-City Vacations, Inc. Air, Hotel, Tours, More $1529 -- Greece: 4-City Vacations, Inc. Air, Hotel, Tours, More by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff - October 5, 2015 at 8:07 PM Tweet 
Greece: It's a destination for history buffs, those who love ancient cultures, and culinary aficionados. Explore the ruins on a budget with this six-night vacation packages with starting rates at $1,529 per person, including air, hotels, guided tours, meals, entrance fees, and more. 
The deal includes: Round-trip airfare from New York City; other departure cities are available at varying rates Two nights' accommodations at the Athenian Callirhoe Hotel in Athens One night's accommodations at the Europa Hotel in Olympia One night's accommodations at the Amalia Hotel in Delphi One night's accommodations at the Divani Meteora Hotel in Kalambaka One night's accommodations at the Royal Olympic Hotel in Athens Six breakfasts, three dinners All transfers via air-conditioned motor coach Airline taxes and fuel surcharges Hotel porterage Various escorted tours with English-speaking guides Attractions' admission fees 
How to get this deal: Visit Virgin Vacations ' website. Travel at these rates is valid December 2015, and February and March 2016 from New York City, though other departure dates and cities are also available. The sale provider hasn't designated a booking deadline. 
Don't forget: Always compare prices from multiple travel providers to make sure that you're getting the best price with this deal. Find Cheap Flights!
